import React, { useState } from "react"; import CartIcon from "../images/CartIcon.png"; import FilterIcon from "../images/FilterIcon.png"; import logo from "../images/logo_sidebar.png"; import MenuIcon from "../images/MenuIcon.png"; import SearchIcon from "../images/SearchIcon.png"; import UserIcon from "../images/UserIcon.png"; import historialAct from "../images/historialAct.png"; import sistemaVal from "../images/sistemaVal.png"; import reportesPer from "../images/reportesPer.png"; import checkout from "../images/checkout.png"; import soporte from "../images/soporte.png"; import idioma from "../images/idioma.png"; const Headerr = () => { const [logMenu, setLogOpen] = useState(false); return (
Bienvenido, Ing. Erick {logMenu && (
Iniciar Sesions
)}
(e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = "#D8572F") } onMouseLeave={(e) => (e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = "transparent") } > Historial (e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = "#D8572F") } onMouseLeave={(e) => (e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = "transparent") } > Sistema de Valoración (e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = "#D8572F") } onMouseLeave={(e) => (e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = "transparent") } > Reportes Personales (e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = "#D8572F") } onMouseLeave={(e) => (e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = "transparent") } > Checkout (e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = "#D8572F") } onMouseLeave={(e) => (e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = "transparent") } > Soporte (e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = "#D8572F") } onMouseLeave={(e) => (e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = "transparent") } > Idioma
); }; const styles = { fixedShell: { position: "fixed", top: 0, left: 0, right: 0, width: "100%", zIndex: 1000, backgroundColor: "#5baed6", display: "flex", flexDirection: "column", }, container: { display: "flex", flexDirection: "column", width: "100%", }, topBar: { display: "flex", alignItems: "center", justifyContent: "space-between", background: "linear-gradient(to right, #2B6DAF, #2AA6E0)", // difuminado de azul claro a oscuro padding: "10px 60px", height: "100px", gap: "50px", }, divBar: { display: "flex", alignItems: "center", justifyContent: "space-between", padding: "10px 170px", height: "90px", width: "1000px", }, logo: { height: "80px", }, searchWrapper: { display: "flex", alignItems: "center", flex: 1, width: "500px", margin: "0 20px", backgroundColor: "white", borderRadius: "25px", border: "1px solid #2b6daf", padding: "5px 10px", }, SmallWrapper: { backgroundColor: "white", border: "1px solid #2b6daf", borderRadius: "20px", width: "50px", height: "40px", display: "flex", alignItems: "center", justifyContent: "center", cursor: "pointer", }, searchInput: { flex: 1, border: "none", outline: "none", padding: "5px 10px", fontSize: "14px", }, iconBtn: { background: "none", border: "none", padding: "0 5px", cursor: "pointer", }, icon: { height: "20px", width: "20px", }, iconUser: { height: "30px", width: "30px", }, user: { display: "flex", alignItems: "center", gap: "5px", color: "white", cursor: "pointer", height: "20px", width: "250px", }, dropdown: { position: "absolute", top: "75px", // right below the button right: "0", // align to the right edge width: "200px", backgroundColor: "white", border: "1px solid #2b6daf", borderRadius: "8px", boxShadow: "0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)", padding: "10px", display: "flex", flexDirection: "column", gap: "10px", zIndex: 1000, }, bottomBar: { backgroundColor: "#003B90", height: "60px", display: "flex", alignItems: "center", padding: "0", // ✅ sin espacios a los lados margin: "0", // por si acaso width: "100%", }, nav: { display: "grid", gridTemplateColumns: "repeat(6, 1fr)", // 6 columnas iguales width: "100%", height: "100%", }, navLink: { display: "flex", alignItems: "center", justifyContent: "center", gap: "8px", textDecoration: "none", color: "white", height: "100%", width: "100%", transition: "background 0.3s, color 0.3s", }, navLinkHover: { backgroundColor: "#D8572F", color: "white", }, navIcon: { width: "40px", height: "40px", objectFit: "contain", }, }; export default Headerr;
